study_title: To Evaluate the Optimal Dose of 68Ga-OPS202 as a PET (Positron Emission Tomography) Imaging Agent in Subjects With Gastroenteropancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumour (GEP-NET)

publications.title: Miller CG, Gronbaek H, Virgolini I, Kjaer A, Terve P, Bahri S, Iversen P, Svirydenka H, Rohban T, Mc...
publications.abstract: Miller CG, Gronbaek H, Virgolini I, Kjaer A, Terve P, Bahri S, Iversen P, Svirydenka H, Rohban T, McEwan S. A novel read methodology to evaluate the optimal dose of 68Ga-satoreotide trizoxetan as a PET imaging agent in patients with gastroenteropancreatic neuroendocrine tumours: a phase II clinical trial. EJNMMI Res. 2021 Sep 6;11(1):84. doi: 10.1186/s13550-021-00819-1.
